tool.name: Fasta Extract Sequence
tool.description: Extract a single sequence from a fasta file.

param.name: dataset
param.label: fasta or multifasta file
param.help: fasta dataset to get statistics for.

param.name: exact
param.label: Exact matches only
param.help: Will only match exact matches for fasta id

param.name: inverse
param.label: Entries NOT matching
param.help: Will return the sequences not matching the given ids

param.name: id
param.label: Sequence ID (or partial)
param.help: Name of the sequence to extract. Will also match partial names and return all matches.

tool.help:
**Fasta Extract Sequence** Extracts a fasta sequence from a multfasta by id (exact or partial)
Latest author: Written by Philip Mabon - Public Health Agency of Canada
Original authors: Written by Torsten Seemann - Victorian Bioinformatics Consortium
Wrapped by Simon Gladman - Victorian Bioinformatics Consortium
------
Outputs in fasta format.
------
Inputs:
Fasta dataset
Sequence id
